title: Cloud9 Plastic-Free Vacuum-Insulated Double-Wall Thermal Stainless Steel Bottle with Tea/Fruit Strainer, 15 oz - 17 oz
features: THERMAL DOUBLE-WALL CONSTRUCTION creates an insulating vacuum that keeps cold drinks icy cold and hot drinks steaming hot; PERFECT CHOICE for gourmet coffee and tea lovers; bottle will not retain the odors or flavors of previous drinks; OUTSTANDING THERMOS for hot drinks when you're on the go

FREE YOURSELF FROM PLASTIC; Like the Cloud9 bottle, the Cloud9 cap is also stainless steel which means YOUR DRINKS WILL NEVER COME IN CONTACT WITH PLASTIC; plastic from bottles and caps can leach into drinks; BPA in plastic can be harmful to people, especially children; SAY GOODBYE to drinking plastic today
GOOD FOR YOU AND THE ENVIRONMENT; The Cloud9 bottle is made with pure food-grade 304 stainless steel; Both bottle and box are recyclable
BONUS STRAINER for fruit-infused water; In addition, strainer can be used to brew large-leaf loose teas right in the bottle
DESIGNED AND CONSTRUCTED WITH GREAT CARE; The difference is in the details
description: We are committed to offering products made with non-toxic materials to environmentally conscious consumers. Did you know that BPA-free plastics can still contain chemicals that are harmful to the body but are not yet regulated? We make sure your beverage never comes in contact with plastic.
The Cloud9's stylish appearance, smooth surface, and rugged, eco-friendly construction make it a true standout. Youâ€™ll look and feel great with this exceptional bottle.
The Cloud9's double walled, vacuum insulated construction ensures:
Your cold drinks will stay cold and hot drinks will stay hot all day; the bottle will never sweat, or feel too hot or too cold to touch.
Hiking, camping, picnics, car trips, work, classes, or shopping! Fits car cup holders, exercise machines, briefcases, backpacks, and more.

Great for making fruit-infused water and large leaf loose tea. Place sliced fruit in the bottle, add ice, and fill with cold water. Snap infuser in place and enjoy all day long. For brewing tea in bottle, see our package insert.
Cloud9 is also a Perfect Choice for:
Juice, sports drinks, non-dairy smoothies, hot or iced coffee or tea, hot cocoa, water, and more.
Just hand wash with warm, soapy water.
Comes with a Limited Lifetime Warranty.
